function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Challenges in assessing polio through sewage samples","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of polio prevalence, leading to potential outbreaks","Mitigation":"Use of advanced sampling and analytical techniques, regular monitoring, and data validation","Technologies":"Advanced molecular biology techniques, digital PCR, next generation sequencing","People":"Public health officials, researchers, and wastewater treatment personnel","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, and wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"Variability in efficiency of DNA/RNA extraction from PCR inhibitor rich samples","Impact":"Inconsistent and unreliable data for spatial and temporal trends, hindering effective analysis","Mitigation":"Standardization of extraction methods, validation of extraction efficiency, and use of advanced molecular biology techniques","Technologies":"Advanced DNA/RNA extraction kits, digital PCR, next generation sequencing","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions and laboratories"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the suitability of dPCR for certain sample types","Impact":"Inaccurate quantification of target genes, leading to unreliable results and data misinterpretation","Mitigation":"Critical evaluation of dPCR suitability for specific sample types, validation of dPCR results, and use of alternative analytical methods","Technologies":"Digital PCR, alternative analytical methods","People":"Researchers, laboratory technicians, and data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions and laboratories"}]}
